name: YQL Auto Tagger
author: Roger Stringer

sections.description:
With the YQL Auto Tagger plugin, you’ll never have to think of tags for your posts again. The plugin uses the Yahoo Query Language to perform semantic analysis of your post text and suggest tags for you. Add them to your post with just a click.

This plugin requires PHP 5 and the cURL library (both of which are available on most web hosts).

Based on the Open Calais Auto Tagger by Dan Grossman – http://www.dangrossman.info
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to /wp-contents/plugins/yql-auto-tagger directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
How do I use this plugin?

YQL Auto Tagger adds a box to your post writing and editing screens with a “Get Tag Suggestions” button. Once you’ve written your post, click the
button and yql Auto Tagger will analyze your post content and suggest a list of tags. Click the plug icon next to a tag to add it to your post’s
tags.

short_description: The plugin performs an analysis of your post text and suggests tags for you.
